Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Perkins
Reviews.Content: I didn't really know anything about cameras but once I got my hands on this one it was amazing text beautiful pictures would recommend it to everyone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 13 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon D5200 24.1 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body (Red) - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR NIKKOR Zoom Lens - Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional EN-EL14 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 24.1 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Red) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Lens and Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
